layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x72
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x72
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,8) size 784x56
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,0) size 630x56 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection {tfoot} at (1,29) size 628x26 [bgcolor=#00FF00]
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,0) size 628x24
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (2,0) size 311x24 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 262x19
                text run at (2,2) width 262: "This tfoot should have a lime background"

              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 262x19
                text run at (2,2) width 262: "This tfoot should have a lime background"
        LayoutTableSection {tbody} at (1,1) size 628x28
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 628x24
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (2,2) size 311x24 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]

                text run at (2,2) width 307: "This tbody should NOT have a lime background"
